snippet.title: New Piyotama Trailer!
snippet.description:
Piyotama® is an excitingly addictive action-puzzle game for your PSP® system that tasks players to help her hatch the eggs before they overflow the nest by simply lining up eggs of the same color and chaining them together four at a time to create combos for a hatching frenzy!

Watch the launch trailer for Piyotama® today!

Piyotama is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC (c) 2010 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
